review_data.title: Gut & gesund, aber Geduld ist gefragt
review_data.content: Ich mag Bad Hunter - die Speisen werden immer frisch zubereitet und sind gesund. Das Personal ist freundlich aber leider...More

review_data.title: Delicious Vegan Bowls`
review_data.content: Great food to eat on the premises or take away for those who want a health kick. There are delicious choices of vegan bowls, soups and wraps. It's heaven for vegans. Flavourful and value for money. The portions are big and tasty.

review_data.title: Ausgezeichnet
review_data.content: Gesund, super lecker, aufmerksames und nettes Servicepersonal. Immer wieder gerne. Essen ist einfach top!

review_data.title: Immer wieder ein Genuss !!!
review_data.content: Eines der besten veganen/vegetarischen Essen in Zürich. Gesund und lecker. Personal immer herzlich und nett. Wir freuen uns bei jedem...More

review_data.title: Grab a quick vegie meal in the city center
review_data.content: Inside Jelmoli shopping mall and in the heart of the city. They have wraps but I specially love the warm bowls with brocoli. Very tasty and quick service.

review_data.title: Fein aber schwer zu kriegen
review_data.content: Das Essen ist recht lecker. Jedoch finde ich es äusserst ärgerlich, dass ich bereits mehrfach um 18:45 da war und...More

review_data.title: Lots of room for improvement
review_data.content: We visited BAD HUNTER at Jelmoli yesterday. The name seems to be a bit too much of a program. First of all, eventhough Zurich is a global city, I still expect to order food in swiss or high german. The good girl didn’t even understand...More

review_data.title: Ok, not great
review_data.content: I had lunch here today-- had the Happy Beet wrap and some broccoli soup. Both were really, really bland. It's a shame. I like the menu and I think the food tasted very fresh. But man it needed salt, pepper and maybe a bit of...More

review_data.title: Freshly made vegetarian food
review_data.content: We came for a small dinner. All food was freshly made and prepared and contained a lot of superfoods. It tasted great. Service explained the concept and the details and was very friendly.
